cause.description:
www.mattandnary.com
Serving the Cambodian people in the Name of Jesus Christ, in Canada as well as in Cambodia.
We are based from Pioneers Canada but can receive support from Pioneers USA:
Pioneers Canada Account number: Matthew and Nary McCullough - Account #11050 (51 Byron Avenue, Dorchester, ON)
Pioneers USA Account number: Matthew and Nary McCullough - Account #130049 (10123 William Carey Drive, Orlando, FL 32827-6020)
(Please do not put our names anywhere on cheques; include a separate piece of paper with our names and Account Number)
Any one willing to partner with us through prayer, finances or through the organization of fundraising would be greatly appreciated. Please contact us via matt@mattandnary.com
1. Our Mission is to reach Cambodians for Christ.
2. Teaching, discipling, baptizing them in the name of the Lord Jesus Christ.
3. The Holy Bible is the manual for all we do.
cause.mission: To reach Cambodians in Canada and back in Cambodia. To share the gospel of Jesus Christ.
cause.name: Christian Cambodian Missions
